results.title: Effects of metformin on atrial and ventricular arrhythmias: evidence from cell to patient

results.title: Kv1.3 Channel Blockade Improves Inflammatory Profile, Reduces Cardiac Electrical Remodeling, and Prevents Arrhythmia in Type 2 Diabetic Rats
results.text_hl: Treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ did not reduce the susceptibility to @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmia@@@, since @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-treated @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ had an incidence (61%) similar to that of untreated @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@diabetic@@@ @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@.

results.title: Effect of metformin on outcomes of catheter ablation for atrial fibrillation.
results.text_hl: We sought to determine whether @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ treatment is associated with a lower risk of @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@atrial arrhythmias@@@ after CA in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus @DISEASE_MESH:D003920 @@@DM@@@ and @DISEASE_Atrial_Fibrillation @DISEASE_MESH:D001281 @@@AF@@@.

results.title: Sulphonylureas versus metformin and the risk of ventricular arrhythmias among people with type 2 diabetes: A population-based cohort study.
results.text_hl: Compared with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_Sulfonylurea_Compounds @CHEMICAL_MESH:D013453 @@@sulphonylureas@@@ were associated with an increased risk of @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@VA@@@ (aHR: 1.42, 95% CI: 1.18 to 1.69).

results.title: Metformin-Associated Lactic Acidosis: A Case Report.
results.text_hl: In fact, there is a black box warning for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, identifying @DISEASE_Acidosis_Lactic @DISEASE_MESH:D000140 @@@lactic acidosis@@@ as the inciting trigger for fatal @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmias@@@ and @DISEASE_Death @DISEASE_MESH:D003643 @@@death@@@.

results.title: Metformin alleviates hyperkalemia-induced arrhythmia and cardiac injury in mice through decreasing SK2 and intracellular Ca<sup>2</sup>.
results.text_hl: KEY FINDINGS: Our study demonstrates that both @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ and insulin have protective effects against @DISEASE_Hyperkalemia @DISEASE_MESH:D006947 @@@hyperkalemia@@@-induced @<m>DISEASE_Arrhythmias_Cardiac</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001145 @@@arrhythmia@@@.
